title: Naan Pizhaippeno Lyrics English Meaning
stanzas:
Naan Pizhaippeno Lyrics English Meaning Enai Nokai Paayum Thotta

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Maamu pozhudhupogala
paadam pidikkala
kannil pasumai kaanala
kaatru kooda adikkala

oru thamarai neerinil
illaamal ingae yaen ?
iru megalai padhangal
manmeedhu punnaavadhen?

or oviyam kaagitham
kollaamal ingae yaen?
adhan aayiram aayiram
vannangal pennaavadhaen?

Naan Pizhaippeno
moochu vaanguthe
nooraiyum thaandi
kaichchal yerudhe

niyaabagam ellaam
paavai aaguthe.
naadagam pole
naatkal poguthe

aayiram pookkal
thoova thondruthe
thondridumpodhe
paavam theerudhe

kaarigai yaale
kaatrum maarudhe
vaanilai veppam
thotru poguthe

kaalai vizhippu vandhadhum
kannil aval mugam.
ennai pudhiya oruvanaai
seiyum seiyyum arimugam

idhu naalvarai naalvarai
illaatha pooondhottam
thidu dhippena dhippena
engengum yaenvandhadhu

unai paarpadhu nichchaiyam
endraana andraadam.
enai sillida vaithidum
boogambam thaan thandhadhu.

Naan Pizhaippeno
moochu vaanguthe
nooraiyum thaandi
kaichchal yerudhe

niyaabagam ellaam
paavai aaguthe.
naadagam pole
naatkal poguthe

yaen unnai paarthaal
poorva niyabagam
yezhettu naalaai
vandhu poganum.

veettukku ponaal
angum un mugam
veembudan vandhe
veezhthi paarkkanum

vennilaa....dhoorathu
paarvaigal podhaathe..
adhai ennidam vaa
endru sonnaalum vaaraadhe.

naangaindhu vaarthaigal
naan serkkiren
vairakal pola ovvondrum
naan korkkiren

yedhenum pesaamal
theeraadhini
uraiyum pani.		 English Meaning
I tried my best :)
Hey Friend, no time pass
No interest in lessons
Eyes got dried up
Not even a breeze

Why a lotus is here
Instead of water ?
Why Angels feet
getting hurt on earth?

Why a painting is here
Instead of a paper?
Why thousand colors
turn into a woman ?

Will I survive,
I am breathing high.
Fever is increasing
Beyond 100

All my thoughts
are with the girl.
All my days are
going like a drama.

Liking  to pour
Thousand flowers.
My sins are gone
on seeing her.

Breeze has changed
Coz of her.
Weather lost its heat
To the gil

While waking up in morning
Its her face in my eyes.
It makes me new person
Everyday.

A garden which was
Not there till now.
How it has come
now suddenly ?

I know, I will see
you everyday.
It gives breezy
feeling inside me.

Will I survive,
I am breathing high.
Fever is increasing
Beyond 100

All my thoughts
are with the girl.
All my days are
going like a drama.

A connect with
 my previous life
Why it should come often
On seeing you ?

It's your face
In home too.
I have to defeat
that  moment.

Hey moon Distant seeing
is not enough.
Even if I ask to come
It won’t

I’am gathering
words to say to you.
And join them
like diamond beads

It's not going to stop
Unless we talk something.
Dew may even freeze.
